name: proteinannotator-protein-annotation
title: Protein Annotator: Functional Protein Annotation
description: Comprehensive protein annotation pipeline for identifying protein functions from sequence data using InterProScan and seqkit. Analyzes protein FASTA files to discover functional characteristics, protein families, domains, and sites by scanning against the InterPro database.
content:
🧬 Protein Annotator: Functional Protein Annotation

Discover Protein Function Through Sequence Analysis

Protein annotation reveals the functional characteristics of proteins by analyzing their sequences against comprehensive databases, identifying protein families, domains, functional sites, and biological roles.

🎯 Pipeline Overview

The nf-core/proteinannotator pipeline performs comprehensive protein sequence analysis:

🔬 Analysis Tools

  • 📊 seqkit stats: Generate statistics and summaries of input protein FASTA files

  • 🔍 InterProScan: Scan protein sequences against InterPro database signatures

  • 📋 MultiQC: Comprehensive quality control reporting

🧬 Functional Annotation Features

  • 🏷️ Protein Families: Identify membership in known protein families

  • 🧩 Domain Detection: Discover functional domains within protein sequences

  • 🎯 Site Identification: Locate active sites, binding sites, and post-translational modification sites

  • 📖 GO Terms: Assign Gene Ontology terms for biological process, molecular function, and cellular component

  • 🧪 Pathway Mapping: Link proteins to biological pathways and networks

📋 Sample Sheet Format

Your CSV samplesheet defines the protein sequences to analyze:

id,fasta
species1,/path/to/species1_proteins.fasta
species2,/path/to/species2_proteins.fasta
ecoli,/path/to/ecoli_proteins.fasta

Each row represents protein sequences from a single species or sample:

  • id: Unique identifier for the sample/species

  • fasta: Path to protein FASTA file containing sequences

📊 Comprehensive Results

Annotation Data

  • 📊 InterProScan Results: Detailed functional annotations in TSV, XML, and GFF3 formats

  • 🏷️ Protein Families: Family classifications and membership information

  • 🧬 Domain Architecture: Complete domain organization and structure

  • 🎯 Functional Sites: Active sites, binding sites, and conserved regions

Quality Control

  • 📈 MultiQC Report: Comprehensive analysis summary with interactive plots

  • 🔍 Sequence Statistics: Length distributions, composition analysis, quality metrics

  • 📊 Annotation Coverage: Percentage of proteins annotated, database hit rates

Analysis-Ready Outputs

  • 📋 TSV Tables: Tab-separated annotation tables for downstream analysis

  • 🗂️ GFF3 Files: Genomic feature format files for genome browsers

  • 📊 Summary Reports: High-level summaries of annotation results

🧪 Applications

Perfect for Research in:

  • 🦠 Microbial genomics • Comparative proteomics

  • 🧬 Functional genomics • Protein evolution

  • 🌱 Plant biology • Metagenomics

  • 🔬 Structural biology • Drug discovery

  • 🧫 Synthetic biology • Biotechnology

Data Types Supported:

  • Protein FASTA files from any organism

  • Translated gene predictions

  • Proteome assemblies

  • Metagenomic protein sequences

Built with Nextflow • Powered by nf-core/proteinannotator dev • Containerized execution • Continuous integration tested
